name: Spree Commerce Demo
description: Spree is a complete open source e-commerce solution built with Ruby on Rails

ADMIN_EMAIL.description: We will create an admin user with this email.

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: We will create an admin user with this password.

LOAD_SAMPLE_DATA.description: We will populate the store with sample data by default. To omit the sample data, change this field to any value other than 'yes'.

scripts.postdeploy: bundle exec rails db:seed && if [ $LOAD_SAMPLE_DATA == yes ]; then SKIP_SAMPLE_IMAGES=true bundle exec rake spree_sample:load; fi
